sentence.Network_en: "Our marriage was a mistake," she said, looking rueful.
sentence.Network_cn: “我们的婚姻是个错误，”她说着，看起来懊悔不已。

sentence.Network_en: He shook his head and gave me a rueful smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 他摇了摇头，遗憾地对我笑了笑。

sentence.Network_en: Mary Ann shot him a rueful look.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛丽·安懊悔地瞥了他一眼。

list.abs: Ellen gave me a rueful smile ., 埃伦对我凄然一笑.
rueful是什么意... ... a rueful smile ： 抱憾的微笑 Reckless youth makes rueful age ： 虚度青春 2. rueful impenitent: 悔恨的.
a rueful shake of the head ., 后悔地摇头.
rueful contemplation of a life full of errors ., 对充满过错的一生的追悔沉思.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (also in the sense 'pitiable'): from the noun rue + -ful

entry.def: If someone is rueful, they feel or express regret or sorrow in a quiet and gentle way.

example.ex: He shook his head and gave me a rueful smile...
example.tran: 他摇了摇头，遗憾地对我笑了笑。

example.ex: 'Our marriage was a mistake,' she said, looking rueful.
example.tran: “我们的婚姻是个错误，”她说着，看起来懊悔不已。

means.word_mean: 1. feeling or expressing pain or sorrow for sins or offenses

auth_sentence.content: His laughter had a credibly rueful edge to it.
auth_sentence.res_content: His laughter had a credibly rueful edge to it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His laughter had a credibly rueful edge to it.

auth_sentence.content: In a rueful plight, crushed by a great defeat.
auth_sentence.res_content: In a rueful plight, crushed by a great defeat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In a rueful plight, crushed by a great defeat.

auth_sentence.content: There is a rueful tone to his nostalgia.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a rueful tone to his nostalgia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a rueful tone to his nostalgia.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……的;充满……的"; 2. 表名词,"满,量"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bane毒药,祸害+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.有害的,致祸的
cheer愉快,欢呼+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.愉快的,高兴的
faith信任,信念+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.守信的,忠实的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的
stems_affixes.word_buile: forget忘记+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fruit果实+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
grace优美+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.优美的
grate=grat感激+ful多……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人希望的,抱有希望的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.给人希望的,抱有希望的
power力量+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.强大的,有力的
rue悔恨+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.后悔的,遗憾的
shame耻辱+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.可耻的;不道德的
success成功,胜利+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.成功的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
stems_affixes.word_buile: thought思考,想法+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
will意志+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.任性的,故意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wonder奇迹+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
hand手+ful满,量→n.一把;少数;一小撮

sentences.en: a rueful shake of the head
She managed a rueful little smile.
sentences.cn: 她勉强露出颇带惆怅的一丝笑容。
